item.description:
Join members and friends of the MoonPool Coven for our 4th Annual Witches’ Ball and Dumb Supper! This is a wonderful way to celebrate Samhain in a traditional way while having a great time! The evening will start with a costume party from 8PM – 11PM. We will have music, refreshments and contest, including costume contest (and possibly even karaoke!)

After the party those who wish (and ALL are invited) can stay for a short ceremony honoring family & friends who have passed, culminating with a traditional Witches’ Dumb Supper.

Admission to the Party is a non-perishable item for donation to the local food pantry, or a pot-luck dish to share at the party.

Children are welcome to the Party but due to the late hour would not be encouraged to attend the ritual. The Dumb Supper will require all in attendance to refrain from speaking during the meal.

We have invited the congregation but it would be very helpful if outside attendees would RSVP on our meetup.com page.
item.name: Samhain Witches Ball & Dumb Supper
